description: This file contains service functions for interacting with the 'weekly_reports' table in a Supabase backend. It provides functions to create a new weekly report and to retrieve existing reports, including validation, error handling, and role-based access considerations.

methods.name: createWeeklyReport({ progress, blockers, plans, week_start, tags, user_id })
methods.description: Inserts a new weekly report into the 'weekly_reports' table in Supabase, validating input and handling errors, including permission errors related to Row Level Security.

methods.name: getWeeklyReports(opts = {})
methods.description: Fetches weekly reports from Supabase with options for ordering, limiting, and retrieval, designed to respect RLS policies and provide helpful error messages when access is restricted.

ctags.name: createWeeklyReport
ctags.pattern: /^export async function createWeeklyReport({ progress, blockers, plans, week_start, tags, user_id /
ctags.signature: ({ progress, blockers, plans, week_start, tags, user_id })
